attributes.action: Traffic problem, Access to a shopping center Bicester Village
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A Facebook group has been formed to campaign against traffic caused by an Oxfordshire shopping village.

The group, "I Hate Bicester Village Traffic", has more than 1,400 members. 

Members said traffic going to the shopping park blocks up surrounding roads and nearby villages at the weekends and during bank holidays. 

A spokesperson for Bicester Village said it was busier than ever after Christmas and was working with the council to ease traffic flows. 

Sallie Wright, from the Facebook group, said: "They've extended Bicester village this year... so the traffic's been even worse. 

"It's bad every weekend, but over the holidays it's even worse."
We have now set up a real petition to get people to realise just how important this problem is. 

LETS GET SOME THING DONE ABOUT THIS TRAFFIC!!!

rejection.details: Please contact your local authority about this issue.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
